info.task: read information about filled in expanded combobox
info.title: Read information about a filled in, expanded combobox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandComboboxAndSetValueToAlabama
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'Alabama'

user: With focus on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
